meanings.definition: The state or quality of being openmouthed.
meanings.sent1: Her openmouthednesses showed her amazement at the magic trick.
meanings.sent2: The children's openmouthednesses at the circus performance were adorable.
meanings.sent3: The openmouthednesses of the puppy watching the bubbles was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The openmouthednesses of the audience was like a sea of astonishment.
meanings.sent5: The openmouthednesses of the baby seeing snow for the first time was priceless.

meanings.definition: The act of gaping or staring with the mouth open in surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: His openmouthednesses at the fireworks display was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The openmouthednesses of the tourists at the majestic waterfall was captured in a photo.
meanings.sent3: The openmouthednesses of the cat watching the laser pointer was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The openmouthednesses of the statue made it seem alive.
meanings.sent5: The openmouthednesses of the little girl seeing a shooting star was unforgettable.
